Hints: The album was released in September 1979, four months after this person became Premier.
Originally a research chemist before becoming a barrister, this person was elected Member of Parliament (MP) for Finchley in 1959.
This person was born Margaret Hilda Roberts in Grantham, Lincolnshire, on 13 October 1925.
